name: SpaceDungeon
description:
Space Dungeon

Your ship is trapped in a dungeon in space.  Enemies are everywhere.  What are you going to do?  Can you escape the space dungeon?

Controls

wasd or arrow keys

Spacebar to fire (shift might also work)

tip: when turning into a tight corridor its easier if you slide along one of the walls diagonally into the corridor

Goal

Destroy all of the enemy generators on each level to gain access to the exit.  If you take too much damage from enemies you will have to start that level over.

Beat all ten levels and you win and escape the Space Dungeon!

Credits
  •  Stairs and Generator and enemy sprites from https://opengameart.org/content/8-bit-jrpg-tilesets
  • Player spaceship sprite from this https://opengameart.org/content/some-other-8-bit-vertical-shooter-assets
  • I made the walls
